entities.transactionPerimeter: Systran SAS, Systran USA, SSI, SJGK, SCL

entities.name: Systran Japan
entities.description: A pioneer and global leader in on-premise and cloud-based translation software, continuously evolving with breakthrough innovations and secured solutions, recently introducing Neural Machine Translation to corporate users via 3 offers. Has successfully built a wide, diversified, loyal and growing customer base across highly sensitive sectors. Evolved from a specialty translation provider to a pioneering digital translation player, and now a leading Neural Machine translation player.
keyStrengths: Pioneer and global leader in on-premise and cloud-based translation software
Wide, diversified, loyal and growing customer base
Solid track record of sustainable growth
A long history as translation forerunner to support demanding customers in a quickly mutating translation environment
proximity and responsiveness with its customers across 8 countries
Several innovations implemented to address new client typologies and needs for cloud based products
very high educational level of workforce which enables it to address technical functions to further develop the business
entities.growthStrategySummary: Ambitious growth strategy including accelerating cloud offering, increasing sales efforts to foster penetration of the B2C / SME segment, fostering R&D of transcript and context awareness translation, and entering the voice-translation market.

entities.officeSpecificInfo: 23 bis, avenue de Messine, 75008 Paris, France
entities.description: headquarter, sales office for Europe/Middle East and other region, R&D center of the group, European language-oriented R&D

entities.name: Systran Pure Neural® Software
entities.description: Neural Machine Translation software offer for corporate users. New generation with a new user interface and an optimized architecture to enhance neural translations’ performance.

entities.name: Systran Translate Enterprise
entities.description: Cloud-based solution for advanced professional translation. Systran’s solution as a B2C Cloud SaaS, open to everyone, with online subscription, payment and configuration.

entities.name: Systran Model Studio
entities.description: An application to customize Systran’s models by retraining them using private translation data. Solution allowing data owners to train its translation engines using its own data resulting in a customized translation model; offered via cloud or on premise. Usually sold with SPNS.

entities.characteristics: Historically market growth was mainly driven by expansion of global trade, increasing international content demand and internationalization of supply chains. The pandemic market experienced a 2% contraction in 2020 due to sectors heavily afflicted by the pandemic but was offset by diversity of sectors served & structural shift to remote workplace. Future market growth driven by recovery from the pandemic, and accelerated market penetration in Asia.
